PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: This aggregation - induced absorption is temperature - sensitive in which the absorption decreases with the increase of temperature , resulting from polymer chain segregation at high temperature.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Aggregation |
| Induced absorption |
| Temperature-sensitivity |
| Absorption (decrease) |
| Polymer chain segregation |
| High temperature |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Temperature-sensitivity of aggregation-induced absorption |
| Absorption decrease due to polymer chain segregation at high temperature |
| Polymer chain segregation at high temperature |

Note: "Aggregation-induced absorption" is a material property that refers to the increase in absorption or scattering of light when a material aggregates. Therefore, it is included in the table. "Temperature-sensitivity" is also a material property that describes how the material property changes with temperature.
